title: Capitol Meridian Partners and Stellex Capital Management Complete Acquisition of Beaufort, the Aerospace and Defense Survival Equipment Division of Survitec
summary: ELLESMERE PORT, U.K. & WASHINGTON & NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Capitol Meridian Partners (Capitol Meridian) and Stellex Capital Management (Stellex) today announced the completion of their carve-out acquisition of Beaufort, the aerospace and defense survival equipment division of Survitec. Industry veteran Raanan Horowitz has been named Board Chair and Dom Cartwright will continue as CEO.
